name: reindictment
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of officially accusing someone of a crime that they have been accused of before: There is still the possibility of reindictment on a more serious charge. All of the charges have been dismissed and there is no chance of re-indictment. These reindictments were not unexpected, but were still unwelcome. Related word
reindict
More examplesFewer examplesThe statute of limitations prevented her reindictment on murder charges.The lawyer argued that there were no grounds for reindictment as the prosecutors had no new evidence.The petitioner exercised the option of demanding re-indictment and retrial.
